name: Powerful uniques
description: Adds new unique rings, charms, amulets and a full sorc equipment. The charms don't seem to drop, so you can buy them at Gheed's. Warning: These uniques are ridiculously overpowered and can take all challenge out of the game.
author: erSch

config.name: Use legacy Snake-oil flavored rock
config.description: In case your game won't start any more, enable this option, remove all Snake-oil flavored rocks from all chars and stashes and then turn this option back off.
